body.quiz:
In the blanks, write the correct noun form. Be careful with spelling!

For example:
Noun: mare, maris n. sea
English: of the seas
Latin Answer: marium

Latin Noun to UseIdentificationLatin Answer
animal, animalis n. animalof the animals*_
mare, maris n. seafor the sea*_
Canis, canis m. dogof the dog*_
mare, maris n. seathe sea*_
